glosses: organizing, putting in order; editing (a document)

examples.text: 1936 April 30, foreign news in Ulusal Birlik
examples.translation: (please add an English translation of this quotation)

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish تنظیم (tanzîm), from Arabic تَنْظِيم (tanẓīm), verbal noun of نَظَّمَ (naẓẓama, “to organize, regulate, control”). Compare Azerbaijani tənzim.
